channel.title: Good at flash? need webhosting? look here!
channel.description:
well basically, i need a decent flash animated webhosting banner made for my site.
in return i will offer 1 year free webhosting.
any takers?
contact me via msn.

item.title: Good at flash? need webhosting? look here!

item.description:
@RXVL wrote:

[quote=“USMC, post:5, topic:123833”]AIM shudder

ok, sure, whats your aim id?

and i could send you a download link to flash?[/quote]

Nono, I have a flash cs3 installer and valid serial code right here, but I don’t have administrative privledges on this computer and my backdoor into the system got locked. I’ll PM you my AIM.
